
### Sigmoid scatter plot <a name="run_sim"></a>



```{r}  
 
output$PKPD_despcriptive_analysis_sigmoid_plot <- renderUI({ 
  # Create a namespace function using the provided id
  #ns <- NS(id)
  
  validate(need(values$data4_PKPD, message="no data found yet"))
  
    script = readLines(paste0(HOME, "/script/desp_sigmoid_PKPD.R"))
    script = paste0(script, sep="\n")   # sep="<br/>")
    script = paste0(script, collapse="")
    
   isolate({ 
      ALL = callModule(module_run_script, "PKPD_despcriptive_analysis_sigmoid_plot", 
                       ALL, 
                       dataset=values$data4_PKPD, 
                       script=script)
   }) 
  

   module_run_script_UI(("PKPD_despcriptive_analysis_sigmoid_plot"), label = NULL) 
     
})

 fluidRow(column(12, uiOutput(("PKPD_despcriptive_analysis_sigmoid_plot"))))

```
